wikipedia_page.main: Tomas Francis (born 27 April 1992) is a Wales-international rugby union player who plays at tight head prop for Ospreys.

response: The Scottish again finished mid-table in the Championship in the 2013–14 season. The team had four players named in the Championship Best XV – American international Eric Fry, Tomas Francis, Mark Bright and Championship top try-scorer Miles Mantella.
